app_descript:
FGTeeV Goozy

Brief: Dive into a thrilling hide-and-seek adventure with the FGTeeV Family like never before experienced on Smart Phones and Tablets! FGTeeV Goozy invites you to a lively yet spine-chilling escapade where staying incognito ensures your survival. Unravel the mysteries of a secretive house as you attempt to stay one step ahead of the game. Brace yourself for heart-racing moments with Goozy - a game that promises a blend of excitement and suspense.

  • üè† Unique Gameplay: Step into a game of hide and seek where your ability to remain unseen is key to uncovering house mysteries.

  • üí° Problem-Solving Puzzles: Utilize the Multitool and hone your memory skills to solve challenging puzzles.
  • üò± Intense Excitement: Experience jumps and thrills as the game's suspense keeps you on the edge of your seat.
